Constructor Summary
EchecksService()

 
Method Summary
String writeEchecksToCSV(List checkTrans)

write all Payment and PaymentLine(s) that have not yet been sent to management via a CSV (as identified with dateSentTo400 in the Check_transaction table) to a CSV (updating dateSentTo400 with the current date) and email the CSV to management.

writeEchecksToCSV

String writeEchecksToCSV(List checkTrans)
write all Payment and PaymentLine(s) that have not yet been sent to management via a CSV (as identified with dateSentTo400 in the Check_transaction table) to a CSV (updating dateSentTo400 with the current date) and email the CSV to management.
